segments.text: My elder aunt feels like vomiting , she is pregnant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She'd better drink plenty of hot water and lie in bed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But she feels like having no appetite at all if she stays at home all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . She will be all right .
segments.speaker: S2
